Summary: watch disk shaped object appear from behind east tree and moved eratically closest ive seen it since the last 2 times
divs: sighting detailssitting on south deck with night vision and watched disks about a mile in the air. moving ,hovering, and disapearing. then i was lloking to east tree and the disk abject came from behind tree almost vertical and moved back and forth leaving a trail of movement. it was so close and very big and very distinctive. scared the crap out of me. fell out of my chair i was so stunned. then watched them for another 20 min. approximately. then came in. i need some night vision recorders. asap. but i can not afford it right now. but any one is welcome to come over and see this. expecially if you have night vision recorder. i must be in a hot spot or they know i'm watching them. last night i beleived i was seing them too but alot of the times it can be a bug in the air and they seem to be round because of the reflection off of them. but when they come very, and i mean very close it is most obvious and frightning too say the least. i cant explain any further. wow! night vision recorder owners welcome. e-mail me at if (e-mail moved to fi field)cms 08\21\11 06:19 flg interested. would appreciate the help .
trends: There has been one other sighting in rome
There were no other sightings in rome on or around August 20th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
